original_title: CTC honours excellence at annual Distributor Awards ceremony
original_body_lines: Ceylon Tobacco Company PLC (CTC), recently held its annual Distributor Awards ceremony on November 23rd, 2024, at the Sri Lanka Exhibition Convention Centre (SLECC), celebrating the outstanding commitment and performance of their distributor network.

The CTC annual Distributor Awards ceremony recognized the extraordinary commitment and accomplishments of CTC’s distributors, celebrating their unwavering commitment and dedication. The awards ceremony was attended by over 2100 distributors and invitees from various regions of Sri Lanka. 135 distributors were recognized and celebrated, across five categories, in line with CTC’s ethos of acknowledging excellence.

Fariyha Subhani, Chief Executive Officer of CTC stated, “The annual Distributors Awards symbolizes CTC’s deep commitment to fostering and celebrating a culture of excellence. By empowering and celebrating resilience and commitment, we build a strong sense of unity and oneness. The commitment shown this year by our distributors has been a catalyst in CTC’s path of progress. Embracing challenges with a positive attitude and celebrating achievements cohesively has contributed towards the growth of our company. I extend my heartfelt congratulations to all the winners this year and look forward to another year of continued collaboration as we journey towards greater excellence in the future.”
